entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?

Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little over two weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me. The heart rate monitor is completely inaccurate, and I want my money back.
Okay, I understand. I can definitely help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?

Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order... Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse you purchased on [Date of Purchase]. Unfortunately, I do see that it's been 15 days since the purchase date. Our standard return window for the VeloBand Pulse and other electronics is 10 days.
What?! Are you serious? I'm barely outside that window! This thing is defective! I want my money back. I didn't even use it much!

I understand your frustration, and I apologize for the inconvenience. While I can't offer a full refund outside of the 10-day return window, I would be happy to offer you store credit for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. This would allow you to choose something else from our store that better suits your needs.
Store credit? Seriously? I don't want store credit! I want my money back. This is ridiculous. I'm a loyal customer! Can't you make a policy exception just this once?

I understand your disappointment. I have reviewed your purchase history, and while I appreciate your loyalty, I am unable to override the return policy for a full refund in this instance. I know it's not ideal, but the store credit is the best option I can offer at this time. I can also explore other options with the VeloBand Pulse; have you tried troubleshooting the heart rate monitor? Sometimes it's a simple fix.
No, I haven't. I just assumed it was broken. Ugh, fine. Store credit it is, I guess. But how does that even work?

Certainly. I'll process the store credit for you right now. It will be automatically applied to your account and will be available for use on your next purchase. You'll receive an email confirmation with the details. And if you do want to try troubleshooting the VeloBand Pulse, we have some helpful resources on our website in the FAQ section.
Okay, I guess that's something. Thanks for at least doing that. I appreciate it.
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks again for your help.
You're welcome! Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
